description: The PB_TX_SET table contains the premium billing payment transaction sets.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: PB_PMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing payment associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: CANCEL_PB_PMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the cancelled premium billing payment associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: As of system 2002 MU4, this column is discontinued and replaced by the PB_TX_SET_INVOICE table. The unique ID of the premium billing invoice associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: CANCEL_PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: As of system 2002 MU4, this column is discontinued and replaced by the PB_TX_SET_CNCL_INV table. The unique ID of the cancelled premium billing invoice associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: PERIOD_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Beginning date of period for the transaction set.

columns.name: PERIOD_TO_DATE
columns.description: Ending date of the period for the transaction set.

columns.name: PMT_METH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Payment method of the transaction set (balance forward or exception).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Balance Forward


Exception

columns.name: CUST_PAIDBY_PTS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Describes portion of the invoice that this transaction set was targeted towards (entire invoice, custom portion, remaining invoice, or custom advice).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Entire Invoice


Custom Portion of Invoice


Remaining Invoice


All Outstanding Txs


None. Custom PTS Advice used in PBU

columns.name: CUST_PTS_CMT
columns.description: Comment associated with a customized transaction set.

columns.name: LATEST_PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the latest premium billing invoice record on the premium billing account when this payment was committed.

columns.name: INC_EFF_FR_DT
columns.description: Effective from date for transactions included in the custom transaction set.

columns.name: INC_EFF_TO_DT
columns.description: Effective to date for transactions included in the custom transaction set.

columns.name: EXC_EFF_FR_DT
columns.description: Effective from date for transactions excluded from the custom transaction set.

columns.name: EXC_EFF_TO_DT
columns.description: Effective to date for transactions excluded from the custom transaction set.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The extract date and time of the record for this table.
